fields.value_description: We are representing the value as an object, because we don't have an exact representation of how the note will look like.
fields.createdAt_description: Represents the date when this object was created
fields.updatedAt_description: Represents the last time when the object was updated
fields.isDeleted_description: This field is used to identify if this object has been soft-deleted
fields.createdById_description: Represents the user's id who has created this object
fields.updatedById_description: Represents the user's id who has made the latest update on this object
fields.createdBy_description: Represents the user who has created this object
fields.updatedBy_description: Represents the user who has made the latest update on this object

activity_notes.create_confirmation: You successfully added a new ActivityNote
